header.title: Samediggi - Saamelaiskäräjät - We get to enjoy again Sámi children and youth theatre!

body.p: We get to enjoy again Sámi children and youth theatre!
Sámi theatre for children and youngsters on Thu 28th of May at SAJOS, INARI.
Children´s play: Pilvi in love at 10 am (duration 40 min).
Youth play (5. class and upwords): Girls, that nobody could bully at 12.15 pm (duration 80 min).
The shows are free. Language: Sámi. Organiser: MÁNNU Sámi Children's Cultural Centre/ The Sámi Parliament.
